node.title: I Proposed New Classification for Websites
node.summary: Nowadays there are a lot of technologies for building websites. You might be disoriented trying to choose something for your site. I did the big research, and I want share information I found.

node.title: I Tried out Flutter for Mobile Apps
node.summary: I have created simple app for Android using Flutter. In this project basic features of Flutter framework are implemented. Also, some native Android API is used.

node.title: Starting 4th Year of University
node.summary: Some news about my progress in university

node.title: I Tried out ASP.NET MVC Pattern
node.summary: During learning in the university I've completed a course project of music web platform. It was supposed to use ASP.NET MVC pattern, Entity Framework, Bootstrap.

node.title: My Personal Site
node.summary:
Latest version (v3)

The very latest iteration of my own website. I made decision to make some things simpler. But functionality became better.

I had several problems with second iteration:

Maintaining server and database is quite expensive for sma...

node.title: Food Delivery Service Client
node.summary:
How did this happen?

This application was created as a course project at the university for the 3rd year.

The theme could be chosen freely. I settled on the following formulation of the problem: "Entrepreneur Mr. N maintains an enterprise for the p...

node.title: Interactive Visualization of the Results of School Competitions
node.summary:
The application visualizes the results of the qualifying round 
of the Olympiads 20/21 from the website of Tomsk State University.

To get acquainted with the results on a specific subject, you 
can download the excel table from their website, or sel...
